contentrichtext.text: {{Zoroastrianism}} This is a '''list of [[Zoroastrianism|Zoroastrians]]''' with a Wikipedia article. __TOC__ == From Greater Iran == * [[Farhang Mehr]], (1923- ): former Deputy Prime Minister of Iran * [[Jamshid Bahman Jamshidian]], (1851–1933): pioneer of modern banking in Iran * [[Keikhosrow Shahrokh]], (1864–1929): proponent of the [[Iranian calendar|Iranian civil calendar]] and designer of the [[Ferdowsi]] mausoleum == From the Indian subcontinent == {{:List of Parsis}} ==References== <references/> [[Category:Lists of people by belief|Zoroastrians]] [[Category:Zoroastrians| ]]
